metaData.label: vae clicked or opened
metaData.criteriaDescription: Approved Document Name equal wi_vae_mult_paediatrieforum-102022_non_2 AND ( Open_Count_vod__c greater than or equal 1 OR Click_Count_vod__c greater than or equal 1 )
